Cathy

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Google Earth/Brazil
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks Ren, We enjoyed it!  ds is still playing nickjr.com games ... Ds just turned 4 and  is enjoying googleEarth but I am crazy about it! Alex ... From: Ren
messages.messageBody:
Thanks Ren,
We enjoyed it! ds is still playing nickjr.com games ...
Ds just turned 4 and is enjoying googleEarth but I am crazy about it!
Alex

----- Original Message -----
From: Ren Allen
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, August 16, 2006 4:38 PM
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Google Earth/Brazil


"Actually I wanted to pass on that I just downloaded GoogleEarth and
it is amazing!!!!!!!!"

Oooh, we discovered Google Earth last year and it is a huge hit around
here! My wee man (Jalen 5y.o.) will sit and move the earth around
asking me a MILLION questions about places and people and flags and.....??

The CIA factbook is a fun place to find out statistics and other
information on every country. We love traveling the earth from our
computer (for now). We have big plans for actually visiting many
places, but that will all happen in it's own time. Jared wants Japan
to be first on the list!

Jared wanted to share a really cool link today. It's a video of
Kingdom Hearts characters singing the Hamster Dance. Totally hilarious
and it actually looks like they're singing it! If you have gamers,
show them this:
http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=-3908097291123139968&q=kingdom+hearts+2

Ren
learninginfreedom.com





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.messageBody:
"Actually I wanted to pass on that I just downloaded GoogleEarth and
it is amazing!!!!!!!!"

Oooh, we discovered Google Earth last year and it is a huge hit around
here! My wee man (Jalen 5y.o.) will sit and move the earth around
asking me a MILLION questions about places and people and flags and.....??

The CIA factbook is a fun place to find out statistics and other
information on every country. We love traveling the earth from our
computer (for now). We have big plans for actually visiting many
places, but that will all happen in it's own time. Jared wants Japan
to be first on the list!

Jared wanted to share a really cool link today. It's a video of
Kingdom Hearts characters singing the Hamster Dance. Totally hilarious
and it actually looks like they're singing it! If you have gamers,
show them this:
http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=-3908097291123139968&q=kingdom+hearts+2


Ren
learninginfreedom.com
